Detailed Description

Contains code which is used for the maximally stable extremal region algorithm.

Author:
Greg Eddington

MAR_PUBLIC void mar_mser_free (  ) 

Frees the MSER filter created by mar_mser_new.

MAR_PUBLIC mar_error_code mar_mser_get_delta ( float *  delta  ) 

Gets the delta value for MSER filter.

May only be called if a MSER filter has been created.

Parameters:
delta Will be filled with the filter delta
Returns:
MAR_ERROR_NONE on success, an error code on failure.

References mser_filter.

Referenced by keyboard().

MAR_PUBLIC mar_error_code mar_mser_get_max_area ( float *  max_area  ) 

Gets the maximum area for MSER filter regions.

May only be called if a MSER filter has been created.

Parameters:
max_area Will be filled with the maximum region area, normalized to [0-1], where one is the total area of the image.
Returns:
MAR_ERROR_NONE on success, an error code on failure.

References mser_filter.

Referenced by keyboard().

MAR_PUBLIC mar_error_code mar_mser_get_regions ( mar_mser **  regions,
int *  num_regions,
unsigned char *  frame_buffer 
)

Calculates and returns the maximally stable extremal regions for a camera frame.

Parameters:
regions A pointer to a pointer which will be modified to point to the array of regions.
num_regions The number of MSER, and the size of the regions array
frame_buffer The camera's frame buffer
Returns:
MAR_ERROR_NONE on success, an error code on failure.

References mar_mser::ellipse_a, mar_mser::ellipse_angle, mar_mser::ellipse_b, mar_mser::ellipse_x, mar_mser::ellipse_y, mser_filter, mser_image_buffer, mser_image_height, mser_image_width, mser_regions, and mser_regions_size.

Referenced by mar_augment_get_regions().

MAR_PUBLIC mar_error_code mar_mser_new ( int  width,
int  height 
)

Creates a new MSER filter.

Must be called before calling other MAR MSER functions.

Parameters:
width The width of the camera frame
height The height of the camera frame
Returns:
MAR_ERROR_NONE on success, an error code on failure.

References MAR_MSER_DEFAULT_NUMBER_OF_REGIONS, mser_filter, mser_image_buffer, mser_image_height, mser_image_width, and mser_regions.

Referenced by mar_augment_init().
